ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository include two significant pull requests aimed at updating 'Game modifier' mods according to the osu-wiki status in Spanish. These updates are part of a larger effort to ensure translations are accurate and up-to-date, with a total of 22 mods being addressed across the two pull requests.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen notable pull requests, including the addition of volume control back to the editor, addressing a regression issue, and a change to the scroll direction for beat snap to match stable versions. These updates aim to enhance the user experience and fix previously introduced bugs.

ppy/osu-tools.summary: Activities in the osu-tools repository involve a push event and a pull request, both focused on adding an option to populate score parameters on the SimulateScreen using a score ID. This enhancement is designed to improve functionality and usability within the simulation tools.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The osu-web repository has a recent pull request that aims to include user tags in Beatmapset searches. This update requires the creation of a new beatmap search index to properly integrate and target the tags within nested beatmap objects, enhancing search functionality and user experience.
